text: Shaun Abrahams is a South African lawyer and head of the National Prosecuting Authority (NPA). He was appointed to the position by president Jacob Zuma in 2015. On 13th August 2018, a South African Constitutional Court found the appointment by Zuma as invalid.https://m.news24.com/SouthAfrica/News/shaun-abrahams-gravely-disappointed-by-concourt-ruling-20180813 | Shaun Abrahams 'gravely disappointed' by ConCourt ruling | News24| ConCourt finds Shaun Abrahams' appointment as NPA boss invalid == References == Category:South African lawyers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Shaun Abrahams
